text: Ahmed Serhan (born 2000 in Germany) is a German jeweler, goldsmith, entrepreneur, and social media personality of Turkish descent. He is the founder and owner of Serhano's Juwelier in Hannover-Kirchrode. Serhan gained national attention through his activity on the social media platform TikTok and appearances on television programs such as Taff (ProSieben) and SAT.1 Frühstücksfernsehen. https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/jeweler https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/jeweler https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/jeweller https://www.vocabulary.com/dictionary/jeweler https://www.dictionary.com/browse/jeweler https://www.collinsdictionary.com/dictionary/english/jeweler http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/science/nature/5099104.stm http://www.farlang.com/gemstones/kunz-magic-jewels/page_360 https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/ancient/vikings/money_01.shtml https://www.metmuseum.org/art/collection/search/13505 http://www.indexmundi.com/en/commodities/minerals/diamond_(industrial)/diamond_(industrial)_t5.html https://money.howstuffworks.com/african-diamond-trade.htm http://www.archaeology.org/news//3270-150507-siberia-denisovan-bracelet http://eprints.whiterose.ac.uk/100091/1/Internet_Arch_Pendant_paper_Milneretal.revisedmanuscript.pdf https://web.archive.org/web/20121007223640/http://austrianindependent.com/news/General_News/2012-10-03/12320/Cavewoman_jeweller_rewrites_gender_history https://web.archive.org/web/20221101113823/https://books.google.com/books?id=RnE9Fa4pbn0C&pg;=PA290&dq;=varna+necropolis+oldest&hl;=en#v=onepage&q;=varna%20necropolis%20oldest&f;=false ==Early Life and Education== Serhan was born in Germany in 2000. At the age of 18, he began an apprenticeship as a goldsmith. During his training, he developed an interest in designing his own jewelry pieces and pursued the goal of establishing his own business. https://web.archive.org/web/20230718083237/https://www.smithsonianmag.com/travel/varna- bulgaria-gold-graves-social-hierarchy-prehistoric-archaelogy-smithsonian- journeys-travel-quarterly-180958733/ https://web.archive.org/web/20190928002452/https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart- news/oldest-gold-object-unearthed-bulgaria-180960093/ https://www.grandviewresearch.com/industry-analysis/jewelry-market http://www.lol-la.com/qa-with-maleficent-costume-designer-manuel-albarran/ http://www.metmuseum.org/toah/hd/ajew/hd_ajew.htm ==Career== In 2023, at the age of 23, Serhan opened Serhano's Juwelier in Hannover-Kirchrode. The store offers a range of jewelry products and custom-made designs. The business also provides services such as jewelry repairs, gold purchasing, and free jewelry appraisals. Serhan’s growing online popularity led to coverage in national media. He and his business have been featured on television programs such as Taff on ProSieben and SAT.1 Frühstücksfernsehen. https://web.archive.org/web/20100602095700/http://tpo.tepapa.govt.nz/ViewTopicExhibitDetail.asp?TopicFileID=MINZ_T14&Language;=English&dumbyparam;=search https://archive.org/details/godssymbolsofa00mill https://www.researchgate.net/publication/303844521 https://theprint.in/feature/from-bahadur-shah-zafar-to-the-nizam-of-hyderabad- a-jewellery-brand-for-the-royals/1197972/ https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/us https://www.nytimes.com/2019/03/27/business/china-war-on-fun-earrings- tattoos.html https://www.thebetterindia.com/86147/history-indian-jewellery- jewels-traditions/ https://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id=mdp.39015069180571&seq;=122 https://books.google.com/books?id=UUtQAAAAMAAJ ==Serhano's Juwelier== Serhano's Juwelier is located at Tiergartenstraße 93 in Hannover-Kirchrode. The store specializes in high-quality jewelry and places an emphasis on individual customer requests and exclusive designs. Social media has played a key role in increasing the visibility and popularity of the store. * Borel, F. 1994. The Splendor of Ethnic Jewelry: from the Colette and Jean-Pierre Ghysels Collection.
